channel.title: Articles on Yinka Adesesan
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on Yinka Adesesan

item.title: My Books of 2019
item.description: Reading has always been a big part of my life and 2019 was a big year in terms of reading for me. I was able to increase the number of book I read from number in 2018 to 20 in 2019. I read books NON-FICTION Daily rituals by Mason Curry The hard things about hard things by Ben Horowitz Thinking fast and slow by Daniel Kahneman Design a better business by a bunch of writers Strategic design by another set of writers Becoming by Michelle Obama Platform: The art and science of personal branding by Cynthia Something Fluent forever by Gabriel Wyner How to be interesting by Jessica Hagy
